biotools.summary: R package for multi-view genomic data integration methodology. It is a tool in R that combines different types of measurements (such as mRNA expression, miRNA expression, DNA methylation, clinical data, etc) for a given set of samples (e.g. patients). The aim is to combine dimension reduction, variable selection, clustering (for each available data type) and data integration methods to find patient subtypes.
